oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: "Organics" in general
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: International organic research theme: - The Organic Food and Farming Education and Research Program in Ohio, USA - Yield effects of grazing and red clover in white clover/ grass mixtures - Opinions on biogas in organic farming - How to include farmers in the emission trading system
